name: Killer Frost
description: In The Flash Season 2, Killer Frost is Caitlin Snow’s dangerous doppelgänger from Earth-2. Unlike the compassionate Caitlin of Earth-1, she’s a cold-hearted metahuman villain with powerful ice abilities, working under Zoom with her lover Deathstorm. Her arc explores her conflict between loyalty to Zoom and her personal pain, showing that even in her darkest form, there are glimpses of Caitlin’s humanity.
cosplayNotes: Cosplayed with icy makeup, silver wig, and frosty blue outfit.

name: Gumi Megpoid (Matryoshka ver.)
description: Gumi Megpoid is a Vocaloid character featured in the popular song 'Matryoshka' by Hachi (Kenshi Yonezu). In this version, Gumi wears a green hoodie with a gas mask theme, alongside Miku, in a surreal and chaotic aesthetic.
cosplayNotes: Wore the green hoodie and Matryoshka-style makeup with painted gas mask details.

name: Hotaru Shidare
description: Hotaru Shidare is an eccentric and flamboyant girl obsessed with Japanese candy (dagashi). She recruits Kokonotsu Shikada in hopes of convincing him to take over his family’s dagashi shop, showing off her dramatic personality.
cosplayNotes: Cosplayed with her signature gothic lolita dress and candy props.

name: Viper
description: Viper (Sabine Callas) is a toxic controller agent in Valorant. She uses poisonous gas and chemical devices to control the battlefield and manipulate enemies’ positioning, while keeping her true motives guarded.
cosplayNotes: Made her green mask, black bodysuit, and neon toxic details.

name: Yuno Gasai
description: Yuno Gasai is the obsessive, cunning, and dangerous main heroine of Mirai Nikki. She possesses the Yukiteru Diary, predicting everything about her love interest, Yuki. Her devotion borders on madness, making her the archetypal yandere.
cosplayNotes: Cosplayed with her school uniform, pink wig, and fake blood-stained props.

name: Hachi (Nana Komatsu)
description: Nana Komatsu, nicknamed Hachi, is a cheerful and romantic girl in Ai Yazawa’s manga/anime Nana. She dreams of love and companionship, often getting swept into relationships and relying on her friends for strength.
cosplayNotes: Wore Hachi’s feminine, romantic outfits with soft styling.

name: Rosalina
description: Rosalina is the guardian of the cosmos and mother figure to the Lumas. She first appeared in Super Mario Galaxy, where she guides Mario on his quest. She is serene, mysterious, and wise.
cosplayNotes: Cosplayed with her star wand, flowing light-blue gown, and crown.

name: Lilo Pelekai
description: Lilo is a quirky Hawaiian girl from Disney’s Lilo & Stitch. She adopts Stitch, an alien experiment, and teaches him about ohana (family). Despite being misunderstood, she is fiercely loving and imaginative.
cosplayNotes: Cosplayed with her red hibiscus dress and plush Stitch.
cosplayLocation: Square One Lilo & Stitch Movie Display

name: Moana
description: Moana is the adventurous daughter of a Polynesian chief, chosen by the ocean to restore the heart of Te Fiti. Brave and determined, she sails beyond the reef to save her people and discover her destiny.
cosplayNotes: Cosplayed with her Polynesian-inspired outfit and handmade oar prop.

name: Elsa
description: In Frozen II, Elsa continues her journey of self-discovery, following the voice that calls her to the Enchanted Forest. She learns about her origins and embraces her role as the Fifth Spirit, bridging humans and nature.
cosplayNotes: Cosplayed with her Frozen II white-and-blue gown and glitter makeup.

name: Daphne Blake
description: Daphne is the fashionable and resourceful member of Mystery Inc. Known as the ‘danger-prone’ girl, she often gets captured but has grown into a capable fighter and investigator in later series.
cosplayNotes: Cosplayed with her purple dress, green scarf, and orange wig.

name: Mikasa Ackerman
description: Mikasa Ackerman is one of the most skilled soldiers in the Survey Corps. Fiercely protective of Eren Yeager, she has unmatched combat skills and a quiet, stoic personality shaped by a tragic past.
cosplayNotes: Cosplayed with Survey Corps uniform, 3D maneuver gear, and short black wig.

name: Shock
description: Shock is the mischievous kid witch from Oogie Boogie’s trio. She is clever, sneaky, and enjoys causing trouble with her companions, Lock and Barrel.
traits: Spellcasting in a playful, chaotic way
cosplayNotes: Cosplayed as the kid witch with purple hat and cloak, green mask details.

name: Aurelia de Selva
description: Aurelia de Selva is a princess marked by a wolf scratch across her face. She carries herself with grace and regality, but her scar tells a story of survival and courage. Her long wavy blonde hair, white corset, and pink translucent skirt reflect her elegance, while her small circular crown hints at her royal heritage. She embodies strength, resilience, and the quiet power of the forest.
traits: Connection to the forest and wilds
cosplayNotes: Cosplayed with long wavy blonde hair, white long-sleeve corset, pink translucent long skirt, and a small circular crown.

name: Katki Liisbet
description: Katki Liisbet was once a normal girl, but some mysterious fate transformed her into a cracked doll. Her short wavy blonde hair and porcelain-like face bear subtle fractures, giving her a fragile yet haunting presence. She embodies the eerie charm of a broken toy that somehow holds a story and soul.
cosplayNotes: Cosplayed with short wavy blonde hair, a dress with a white collar top and brown bottom, and broken doll makeup details.

name: Ainsley Lullia
description: Ainsley Lullia, known as Luli, is a pink nature fairy from medieval Scotland. She flits gracefully through meadows with her white wings and elf ears, wearing a white dress with a moss top and flowering vines. She loves napping among flowers, practicing archery with calm precision, and sprinkling gold pixie dust with her star vine wand.
cosplayNotes: Pink hair and eyelashes with sparkly makeup, and elf ears. Friend thrifted a white dress and we added moss, vines and flowers. There are vines around her white wings, gold pixie dust, and star vine wand.

name: Ramona Flowers
description: Ramona Victoria Flowers is an American expatriate living in Toronto, Canada. She works as a 'Ninja delivery girl' for Amazon.ca, possessing the ability to travel through Subspace, allowing her to teleport. Known for her guarded personality, she reveals very little about her past in New York before she moved to Toronto. Ramona is also a tea enthusiast, as discovered when Scott is bombarded with a list of teas in one of Ramona's cupboards of her home. To date her, Scott must defeat her seven evil exes, each representing a challenge to their relationship.
cosplayNotes: Cosplayed with blue hair, steampunk goggles, and a circle bag with blue star.
cosplayLocation: Scott Pilgrim vs the World Tribute Performance at Lee’s Palace
